author: fmeschbe
msg: Don't use search path if the relpath is already absolute

author: fmeschbe
msg: * Fix servlet root path setting (must have leading and trailing slash)
* getServletAt: If there it is not possible to list and find servlets
at the location, try location/basename directly
* ServiceRegistration must use resource provider not servlet

author: fmeschbe
msg: Stream the resource if it is not a servlet, there is no request
extension and the resource can provide an InputStream

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-152 - fix parsing of application/x-www-form-urlencoded parameters, using hardcoded default encoding for now

author: gsim
msg: Added option for making each published message have unique data (that can be tracked e.g. for latency measurement)
